column4: back. neither wvdial nor pon will work, because apparantly I have no such device as "/dev/modem". What do I need to set up?
make a link from /dec/ttyS0 or whichever serial port you use to /dev/modem
aah. Thankyou. That's all I need to do? *is wasting 25cents every time he reconnects*
should work - make sure it *is* ttyS0 and not, say, ttyS1
according to the "network settings" utility in the System menu, my modem is on /dev/ttyS1. Substitute accordingly?
also make sure the user is in dialout and dip groups
and I would suggest using the pppconfig utility to set up the connection
how do I tell which one I've got?
on warty you have oss as well
